channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [STALLION] Stallion India Fluorochemicals Ltd to Consider and Approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 and nine months of FY2025-2026
item.description:
Stallion India Fluorochemicals Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on 29th January 2026 to consider and approve the unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended on 31st December 2025. This is in accordance with the Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended from time to time.

  • Stallion India Fluorochemicals Ltd to consider and approve unaudited financial results for Q3 and nine months of FY2025-2026
  • The meeting is scheduled on 29th January 2026
  • The financial results are for the quarter and nine months ended on 31st December 2025
  • The consideration and approval is in accordance with the Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended from time to time

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Stallion India Fluorochemicals Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [RCL] Radhagobind Commercial LTD Receives Provisional List of Expressions of Interest
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Radhagobind Commercial Ltd has submitted a provisional list of Expressions of Interest (EOIs) for Section 25(2)(h) of the IBC in compliance with SEBI regulations. The list includes Anuj Jalan, Bhawarlal Camellia Tradex Private Limited, Madhusudhana Reddy, M Dynamic Services and Security Limited, and several other applicants. This compilation is provisional, subject to further verification and updates, and has been filed in good faith to ensure transparency and adherence to regulatory timelines.

  • Radhagobind Commercial LTD submits provisional EOIs for Section 25(2)(h) of the IBC.
  • List includes Anuj Jalan, Bhawarlal Camellia Tradex Private Limited, Madhusudhana Reddy, and M Dynamic Services and Security Limited among others.
  • Compilation is provisional and subject to further verification and updates.
  • Filed in good faith to ensure transparency and adherence to regulatory timelines.
  • Includes various individual applicants, consortiums, and joint ventures.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Radhagobind Commercial Ltd | Category: Deals

item.title: [MARCLOIRE] Marc Loire Fashions Ltd Opens New Store, Total Count Now 4
item.description:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Marc Loire Fashions Ltd has announced the opening of a new store in Delhi- 110033. This brings the total number of stores to 4.

  • Marc Loire Fashions Ltd has opened a new store
  • The new store is located at B-12/B, Majlis Park, Adarsh Nagar, Delhi- 110033
  • This brings the total number of stores to 4

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Marc Loire Fashions Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [BANSTEA] Bansisons Tea Industries Ltd Reports Q3 and Nine Months Results for 2025
item.description:
Bansisons Tea Industries Ltd has announced its unaudited financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The company's revenue, expenses, and net profit are reported in the statement. The Board of Directors reviewed the business and approved the financial results in the meeting held on January 26, 2026. The independent auditor, Hiren J. Maru, has also issued a review report on the quarterly unaudited standalone financial results.

  • Bansisons Tea Industries Ltd has released its unaudited financial results for Q3 and nine months ended December 31, 2025.
  • The company's revenue, expenses, and net profit are reported in the statement.
  • The Board of Directors reviewed the business and approved the financial results in the meeting held on January 26, 2026.
  • Hiren J. Maru, the independent auditor, has issued a review report on the quarterly unaudited standalone financial results.
  • The financial results are prepared in accordance with Indian Accounting Standards 34 and other accounting principles generally accepted in India.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: BANSISONS TEA INDUSTRIES LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [BANSTEA] Bansisons Tea Industries Ltd Approves Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025
item.description:
Bansisons Tea Industries Ltd, formerly known as Novyra Pharmachem Limited, held a Board Meeting on January 26, 2026, where they approved the un-audited financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The meeting was conducted in accordance with Regulation 30 and 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015. The company's management and Board of Directors have prepared the statement in accordance with Indian Accounting Standards 34 and other accounting principles generally accepted in India.

  • Bansisons Tea Industries Ltd approved the un-audited financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.
  • The approval was given in accordance with Regulation 30 and 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
  • The financial results were prepared in accordance with Indian Accounting Standards 34 and other accounting principles generally accepted in India.
  • The Board Meeting was held on January 26, 2026.
  • The company's name was changed from Novyra Pharmachem Limited to Bansisons Tea Industries Ltd.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: BANSISONS TEA INDUSTRIES LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [IBREALEST] Embassy Developments Ltd. to Raise Funds via NCDs
item.description:
Embassy Developments Ltd. has announced a meeting of the Board of Directors on 29/01/2026 to consider and approve the raising of funds by way of issuance of non-convertible debentures. The meeting will be held in accordance with Regulation 29(1)(d) and Regulation 29(2) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. The fundraising is subject to applicable regulatory and/or statutory approvals.

  • Embassy Developments Ltd. to raise funds through non-convertible debentures
  • The fundraising is subject to applicable regulatory and/or statutory approvals
  • The decision will be made in a Board of Directors meeting scheduled on 29/01/2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: INDIABULLS REAL ESTATE LTD. | Category: Investment

item.title: [CPL] Captain Polyplast Ltd. Announces Board Meeting to Approve Q3 Results for FY2025-26
item.description:
Captain Polyplast Ltd. has announced a board meeting scheduled for Saturday, 7th February, 2026, to consider and approve the standalone & consolidated unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 31st December, 2025. The trading window for directors, promoters, designated employees, and connected persons of the company will be closed from 1st January, 2026, and will end 48 hours after the results are made public.

  • Captain Polyplast Ltd. to hold a board meeting on 7th February, 2026
  • The meeting aims to consider and approve the Q3 FY2025-26 financial results
  • The trading window for insiders will be closed from 1st January, 2026
  • The window will reopen 48 hours after the results are made public

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Captain Polyplast Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [GOCOLORS] Go Fashion (India) Ltd Announces Board Meeting to Consider Buy-Back of Equity Shares
item.description:
Go Fashion (India) Ltd has informed the BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled on 29/01/2026. The agenda includes consideration and approval of Update on board meeting & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and year to date ended December 31* 2025, and a proposal for buy-back of equity shares of the Company in accordance with the SEBI (Buy-Back of Securities) Regulations, 2018, as amended.

  • Go Fashion (India) Ltd has scheduled a Board Meeting on 29/01/2026
  • The agenda includes consideration and approval of Update on board meeting & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
  • The Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and year to date ended December 31* 2025 will be considered
  • A proposal for buy-back of equity shares of the Company will be discussed
  • The buy-back proposal will be in accordance with the SEBI (Buy-Back of Securities) Regulations, 2018, as amended

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Go Fashion (India) Ltd | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [CAPPIPES] Captain Pipes Ltd to Approve Q4 & FY2025 Results on Feb 7, 2026
item.description:
Captain Pipes Ltd has scheduled a Board Meeting on February 7, 2026, to consider and approve the standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results for the quarter and year ended on December 31, 2025. The trading window for directors, promoters, designated employees, and connected persons will be closed from January 1, 2026, and will reopen 48 hours after the results are made public.

  • Captain Pipes Ltd to hold a Board Meeting on February 7, 2026
  • Meeting to consider and approve Q4 and FY2025 financial results
  • Trading window for insiders to close from January 1, 2026
  • Trading window to reopen 48 hours after results are made public

item.title: [CPL] Captain Polyplast Ltd. to Approve Q3 FY2025-26 Financial Results on Feb 7, 2026
item.description:
Captain Polyplast Ltd. has informed BSE that their Board of Directors will meet on February 7, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter ended on December 31, 2025. The Trading Window Close Period has commenced from December 1, 2026, and will end 48 hours after the results are made public.

  • Captain Polyplast Ltd. to consider and approve Q3 FY2025-26 financial results
  • Board meeting scheduled on 7th February 2026
  • Financial results pertain to the quarter ended on 31st December 2025
  • Trading Window Close Period from December 1, 2026, to 48 hours after results are made public
